frontmatter.title: Building Scalable Distributed Systems with a Raspberry Pi Cluster
frontmatter.summary: In this project, I’m leveraging a Raspberry Pi cluster to create scalable distributed systems. By connecting multiple Raspberry Pis, I aim to enhance processing capabilities and explore the principles of distributed computing, making complex tasks more efficient and manageable.
